feels.name: Indulgence
feels.quote: Scrap, whenever she looked at Mr. Wilkins, saw him in his towel, dripping water, and felt indulgent.

causedByEvent.name: Mr. Wilkins's appearance in a towel

feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: And for the life of her she couldn’t help smiling. She couldn’t help it.

feels.name: Delight
feels.quote: Mrs. Fisher was delighted with him.

feels.name: Secret understanding
feels.quote: Mrs. Fisher and Lady Caroline had a singular feeling of secret understanding with Mr. Wilkins.

feels.name: Delight
feels.quote: Her face sparkled with delight at the instantaneous effect of San Salvatore.

feels.name: Pride
feels.quote: Her face red with pride in him.

causedByEvent.name: Mr. Wilkins's reaction to her confession
